trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Absztrakt osztály biztosít vezérlők, amelyek lehetővé teszik több elem kijelölését.

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the MultiSelector class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy osztály származik a MultiSelector osztály, állítsa be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>tulajdonságot `true` többszörös kijelölés engedélyezi a vezérlőben.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>absztrakt osztály, és közvetlenül nem példányosítható.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: Új kijelölés tranzakció kezdődik.

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdateSelectedItems method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A BeginUpdateSelectedItems metódus készletek <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>való `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>módszer beállítása <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>való `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>van <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Ez a metódus meghívásakor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdez vagy beállít egy értéket, amely jelzi, hogy az a többszörös elemeknek a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> egyszerre választható ki.

trans-unit.source: Set the CanSelectMultipleItems property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: A tulajdonsága CanSelectMultipleItems `true` egy származtatott osztályban, amely többszörös kijelölés engedélyezéséhez.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha több elemeknek a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> egyszerre választani, ellenkező esetben lehet <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A kiválasztott elemek véglegesíti a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>való `false` , és frissíti a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>gyűjtemény.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>módszer beállítása <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>való `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>van <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Ez a metódus meghívásakor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> jelenleg működik-e a tömeges frissítése a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>gyűjtemény.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>metódus állítja IsUpdatingSelectedItems `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>metódus állítja IsUpdatingSelectedItems `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> jelenleg működik-e a tömeges frissítése a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>gyűjtemény; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kijelöli az összes eleme a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: A metódus csak akkor, ha használható <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>van `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Az elemek beolvasása a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> ki vannak jelölve.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the SelectedItems collection.
trans-unit.target: Ha <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>van `false`, a SelectedItems gyűjtemény egynél több elem nem vehető fel.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Ehhez kísérletek kivétel miatt.

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Az elemek a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> ki vannak jelölve.

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az elemek kijelölésének megszüntetése az <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer, függetlenül attól, hogy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>van `true` vagy `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>
